summary: makes the armors (Vanilla DD DB) you craft invisible and also the armors the npcs are wearing
descriptionHtml:
[color=#fce5cd][size=4]
                                                                                                                         


[/size][/color]

                                                                               [size=6][i][b][color=#ff7700]A NAKED WORLD[/color][/b][/i][/size]








[b][color=#ff7700]DESCRIPTION :[/color][/b]

[color=#fce5cd]This mod makes the armors (and clothes) the NPCs are wearing [u]invisible[/u] (vanilla , daunguard , dragonborn) and also the vanilla armors you craft or the Dawnguard and Dragonborn ones too depending on the version you choose to install.

So the NPCs will still be wearing their usual armors keeping their armor ratings and effects (if they have any) but these armors or clothes will be invisible .[/color]

[color=#fce5cd]What you will see depends on the Body mod you are using , [color=#ffffff]s[color=#fce5cd]o you need a naked body mod to see everyone naked or you will see them in the vanilla under wears[/color][/color].

(see notes bellow about the non included armors or clothes)  [/color]

[b][color=#ff7700]VERSIONS :[/color][/b]

[color=#fce5cd]1- VANILLA version needs only SKYRIM last version .
2- DAWNGUARD version needs also the DG DLC .
3- DAWNGUARD + DRAGONBORN needs both DLC .
4- DG + DB + WEAPONS AND ARMOR FIXES REMADE version , Needs both DLC and the Weapons And Armor Fixes remade mod (last version) .[/color]
   [color=#fce5cd] WAF LINK (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34093/?)[/color] .


[b][color=#ff7700]IMPORTANT NOTES :[/color][/b]

[color=#ff7700]Frosfall users :[/color] [color=#fce5cd]you will still get the normal benefits (for frostfall) of the various pieces your character wears even if they are invisible .

[color=#ff7700]Naked comments :[/color] [/color][color=#fce5cd]you will not hear any naked comments if you are wearing the invisible armors .[/color]

[color=#fce5cd][color=#ff7700]Effects and armor ratings :[/color] the mod does not remove the armors or clothes the NPCs are wearing or their effects it only makes them invisible .[/color]

[color=#fce5cd][color=#ff7700]Body types :[/color] [/color][color=#fce5cd][color=#fce5cd]the mod will work normally with any normal male or female body mod UNP , CBBE etc ... ([u]as long as it's not using independent meshes for[/u]
                   [u]the genitals[/u]) .[/color]

[color=#ff7700]Scripts :[/color] this mod is script free .
[/color]
[color=#fce5cd][color=#ff7700]Footstep sound :[/color] I made it so you'll hear a bare footstep sound when wearing any invisible footwear .[/color][color=#fce5cd]

[/color]
[color=#fce5cd]All versions are USKP compatible . they carry on the USKP fixes and the other unofficial patches fixes accordingly . the DG DB WAF version carries also the fixes and changes of the WAF mod . [/color]

[color=#fce5cd]the Child clothes are not included neither the Draugrs or the Falmers ones , Miraak and Azhidal not included , the Archmages clothes and the Greybeards ones are also not included neither the dragon priests masques .[/color]

[color=#fce5cd]


[color=#ff7700][size=3]My other mods :[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61811/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D61811%26preview%3D&pUp=1#]Bandits glory[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63191/?#]Bandits glory hearts and sword[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64187/?#]Grim's Dream[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59205/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D59205%26preview%3D&pUp=1#]With purple to violet[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58720/?#]Dragons[/url]

[/color]
[img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/64064-1-1427251232.png[/img]
[color=#fce5cd]The character is wearing a full set of iron armor as visible in the inventory the armor rating (76) is also visible but the armor pieces are instead invisible on the character as seen in the background .

[/color]


[size=3][color=#ff0000]              MAYBE[/color] [color=#ff7700]YOU[/color] [color=#ffff00]WOULD[/color] [color=#00ff00]LIKE[/color] [color=#00ffff]TO[/color] [color=#1155Cc]TRY[/color] [color=#9900ff]TO[/color] [color=#ff0000]ZERO[/color] [color=#ff7700]TO[/color] [color=#ffff00]THE[/color] [color=#00ff00]BASE[/color] [color=#00ffff]AND[/color] [color=#1155Cc]THEN[/color] [color=#9900ff]SWITCH[/color] [color=#ff0000]TO[/color] [color=#ff7700]THE[/color] [color=#ffff00]SEVEN[/color] [color=#00ff00]PERFECT[/color] [color=#00ffff]COLORS [/color][color=#1155Cc]
                          WITH[/color] [color=#9900ff]ZEROING [/color][color=#ff0000]INTERVALS[/color] [color=#ff7700]...[/color] [color=#ffff00]TRY[/color] [color=#00ff00]TO[/color] [color=#00ffff]NOTE[/color] [color=#1155Cc]THE[/color] [color=#9900ff]CHANGE[/color] [color=#ff0000]IN[/color] [color=#ff7700]MOOD[/color] [color=#ffff00]IF[/color] [color=#00ff00]YOU[/color] [color=#00ffff]LIKE [color=#1155Cc]THE[/color][/color] [color=#9900ff]IDEA[/color] [color=#ff0000]
                                                  ([color=#ff7700]SEARCH[/color][/color] [color=#ffff00]FOR[/color] [color=#00ff00]GEARS[/color] [color=#00ffff]WITH[/color] [color=#1155Cc]PERFECT[/color] [color=#9900ff]CLEAN[/color] [color=#ff0000]COLORS[/color][/size][size=3][color=#ff7700]) [/color][/size][size=3][color=#ff7700][color=#ffff00]
                                                                               ...[/color][/color][color=#00ff00]IT'S [color=#00ffff]A[/color][/color] [color=#1155Cc]STEP[/color] [color=#9900ff].[/color][/size]
